messages.content: Your vote is so important this time, both locally and nationally.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Record rise in the state pension
Liberal Democrat action within the coalition has provided £17m extra funding per year to local schools through the pupil premium.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Labour will borrow too much, risking the economy. The Conservatives will cut too much, sacrificing the least well off.

issues.economy: Labour will borrow too much, risking the economy. The Conservatives will cut too much, sacrificing the least well off. The Liberal Democrats will borrow less than Labour, and cut less than the Conservatives, building a stronger economy and fairer society, creating opportunity for everyone.
issues.education: Liberal Democrat action within the coalition has provided £17m extra funding per year to local schools through the pupil premium. £2.5 billion for struggling school kids.
issues.health: Meanwhile, I am fighting the Labour-controlled Council's plans to close day centres for vulnerable people.

politicalExperience.achievements: Liberal Democrat action within the coalition has provided £17m extra funding per year to local schools through the pupil premium.

images.caption: Record rise in the state pension

leaflet.additionalNotes: PS. Please take just a few minutes to complete and return the enclosed form today. Your vote could decide who wins here.
